titles.title: To prohibit certain uses of algorithmic decision systems to inform individualized prices and wages, and for other purposes.
To prohibit certain uses of algorithmic decision systems to inform individualized prices and wages, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
